item.title: 5 Best Phones With Headphone Jacks (2025): Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Headphone jacks are endangered, but they’re not gone. Here are our favorite smartphones that still let you plug and play.

item.title: Jackrabbit OG2 Pro and XG Pro Review (2025): Little and Peppy
item.description: JackRabbit’s Pro generation of tiny ebikes is zippier, goes farther, and makes you popular with strangers.

item.title: Eargo 8 Hearing Aids Review: Too Expensive
item.description: Eargo’s latest hearing aids are lightweight and have great audio quality, but the high price doesn’t make sense in a tightly competitive market.

item.title: 12 Best USB Microphones (2025): USB-C, USB-A, Wireless
item.description: Looking to boost your audio quality on Zoom, YouTube, TikTok, or while gaming? We’ve got you covered.

item.title: Best Noise-Canceling Headphones (2025): Over-Ears, Wireless Earbuds, Workout Pairs
item.description: Tune out (or rock out) with our favorite over-ears and earbuds.
